verbose_text: Both liberation and deoxyribonic acid formation resulted from breaking the sugar-phosphate backbone.38 The changes in primary and secondary structure of DNA were investigated in the presence of H 2 O 2 and metal ions, Fe 2+ accelerated the double- and single-strand breaks, cross linking, and decreased the rates of base destruction.
